CHAT.comment: MARYLAND, Petitioner v. MICHAEL BLAINE SHATZER, SR.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:05 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF GEN. DOUGLAS F. GANSLER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF TOBY J. HEYTENS ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CELIA A. DAVIS ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF GEN. DOUGLAS F. GANSLER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:04 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
